sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen zǒu ba!
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Allons-y !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's go!

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我在路上碰到了老朋友。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ zài lùshang pèngdào le lǎo péngyou.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai rencontré un vieil ami sur la route.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I ran into an old friend on the road.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他是一个普通的上班族。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì yī gè pǔtōng de shàngbānzú.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est un employé de bureau ordinaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is an ordinary office worker.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng bu chū hǎo bànfǎ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je n'arrive pas à trouver une bonne solution.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I can't think of a good solution.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zhōngwǔ chángcháng chī kuàicān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il mange souvent de la restauration rapide à midi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He often eats fast food at noon.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qiánnián wǒ qù le yī tàng Rìběn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a deux ans, je suis allé au Japon.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Two years ago, I went to Japan.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 今天是晴天，适合出去玩。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīntiān shì qíngtiān, shìhé chūqù wán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Aujourd'hui il fait beau, c'est parfait pour sortir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Today is sunny, suitable for going out.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā tídào le nǐ de míngzi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a mentionné ton nom.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He mentioned your name.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǎn'ān, hǎo mèng!
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Bonne nuit, fais de beaux rêves !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Good night, sweet dreams!

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā diǎntóu biǎoshì tóngyì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a hoché la tête pour montrer son accord.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He nodded to show agreement.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ bù tài xǐhuan chī là.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je n'aime pas trop manger épicé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I don't really like spicy food.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā cóng bāo lǐ náchū yī běn shū.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a sorti un livre de son sac.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He took out a book from his bag.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zhèngshì wǒ xiǎng yào de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est exactement ce que je voulais.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is exactly what I wanted.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā yīshēng dōu zài zhuīqiú mèngxiǎng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a poursuivi ses rêves toute sa vie.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He pursued his dreams all his life.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā gānggāng líkāi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il vient juste de partir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He just left.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā qǔdé le hěn dà de jìnbù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a fait de grands progrès.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has made great progress.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiàn yīfu yào sānbǎi kuài qián.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce vêtement coûte trois cents yuans.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This piece of clothing costs three hundred yuan.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ zhǎo bu dào wǒ de yàoshi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je ne trouve pas mes clés.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I can't find my keys.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè běn shū zhēn hǎokàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce livre est vraiment bien.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This book is really good.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen zǒulù qù xuéxiào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous allons à l'école à pied.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We walk to school.
